```{r Package Pre-Loading}
library(quantmod)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library(timetk)
library(beepr)
```


```{r Data Scraping}
min_date <- "2015-01-01"
max_date <- "2020-01-01"
raw_data <- quantmod::getSymbols(Symbols = "BRX")
raw_data <- tq_get(x = "BRX", get = "stock.prices",
                   from = min_date,
                   to = max_date) %>%
  select(date, BRX = adjusted)
raw_data

```
